quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
name: Colin Powell

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
name: David Bailey

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
name: Walt Disney

quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
name: LL Cool J

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I am just a girl chasing her dreams and having an amazing adventure.
name: Madeline Stuart

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.
name: Rachel Corrie

quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A heart without dreams is like a bird without feathers.
name: Suzy Kassem

quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
name: Mike Tyson

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
name: Ben Carson

quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
name: Paul Valery

quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.
name: Shanice Williams

quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
name: Les Brown

quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
name: Ferdinand Porsche

quote: Job training empowers people to realize their dreams and improve their lives.
name: Sylvia Mathews Burwell

quote: Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations.
name: Ryunosuke Satoro

quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
name: Anatole France

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.
name: Vin Diesel

quote: Believe in yourself, go after your dreams, and don't let anyone put you in a box.
name: Daya

quote: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
name: John Wooden

quote: Follow your dreams and use your natural-born talents and skills to make this a better world for tomorrow.
name: Paul Watson

quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
name: James Dean

quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Flying dreams mean that you're doing the right thing with your life.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
name: Debby Boone

quote: Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Hold fast to dreams For when dreams go Life is a barren field Frozen with snow.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.
name: Mary Webb

quote: Follow your dreams. Just make sure to have fun too.
name: Chris Brown

quote: Our life dreams the Utopia. Our death achieves the Ideal.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Without peace, all other dreams vanish and are reduced to ashes.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on; and our little life is rounded with a sleep.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.
name: Jim Valvano

quote: When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
name: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
name: Les Brown

quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: We're in the business of selling pleasure. We don't sell handbags or haute couture. We sell dreams.
name: Alain Wertheimer

quote: I never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality.
name: Frida Kahlo

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
name: Les Brown

quote: You have to keep going and pursue your dreams.
name: Joey King

quote: Don't let your dreams be dreams.
name: Jack Johnson

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.
name: Bear Bryant

quote: In dreams begins responsibility.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
name: Walter Scott

quote: No person has the right to rain on your dreams.
name: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Visions are worth fighting for. Why spend your life making someone else's dreams?
name: Tim Burton

quote: Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off.
name: Jacob Latimore

quote: Just follow your dreams and be patient.
name: Angelique Kerber

quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Sometimes dreams are wiser than waking.
name: Black Elk

quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.
name: Dave Matthews

quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.
name: Mitch Hedberg

quote: If dreams are like movies, then memories are films about ghosts.
name: Adam Duritz

quote: Oh, I was never a businessman. I was a visionary, a dreamer.
name: Jim Bakker

quote: Let us keep the dance of rain our fathers kept and tread our dreams beneath the jungle sky.
name: Arna Bontemps

quote: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Where all is but dream, reasoning and arguments are of no use, truth and knowledge nothing.
name: John Locke

quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: You have to know your identity. It's the biggest thing in wanting to pursue creative dreams.
name: Lauren Daigle

quote: I would like to see anyone be able to achieve their dreams, and that's what this organization does.
name: Sergey Brin

quote: As I've grown - dare I say it - older, I had hopes of indulging my dreams of being a sailor.
name: Jimmy Webb

quote: Like dreams, statistics are a form of wish fulfillment.
name: Jean Baudrillard

quote: Today I know that there is still work to be done, but along the way my I am achieving my dreams.
name: Candace Parker

quote: I don't listen to people who say my dreams are impossible; I just work to prove them wrong.
name: Liya Kebede

quote: I'm fulfilling my dreams that I had as a kid every single day.
name: Aaron Rodgers

quote: When the legends die, the dreams end; there is no more greatness.
name: Tecumseh

quote: Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
name: Eugene Ionesco

quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
name: Edgar Cayce

quote: You keep dreaming big, never put the limit on your dreams, and believe that everything can come true.
name: Bianca Balti

quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
name: Usher

quote: Reverie is when ideas float in our mind without reflection or regard of the understanding.
name: John Locke

quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
name: Anais Nin

quote: Capitalism is always evaluated against dreams. Utopia is a dream. It doesn't exist.
name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: Dare to visualize a world in which your most treasured dreams have become true.
name: Ralph Marston

quote: I think everyone dreams of that nice romantic wedding.
name: Lance Bass

quote: We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.
name: Jesse Jackson

quote: No one may speak for the dead, no one may interpret their mutilated dreams and visions.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Queen songs tend to be about very personal things: personal dreams and personal ambitions.
name: Brian May

quote: No matter what happens, one should not stop dreaming... dreams do come true.
name: Neil Nitin Mukesh

quote: Every scientist dreams of doing something that can help the world.
name: Tu Youyou

quote: So many financial dreams are thwarted by the failure to act upon good intentions.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Dreams sometimes foretell the future.
name: Mickey Hart

quote: We should never discourage young people from dreaming dreams.
name: Lenny Wilkens

quote: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.
name: Ralph Lauren

quote: The dreams and passions stored within hearts are powerful keys which can unlock a wealth of potential.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: Lose your dreams and you might lose your mind.
name: Mick Jagger

quote: Dreams grow if you grow.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: I know how men in exile feed on dreams.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God.
name: Vin Scully

quote: A lot of dreams can turn to nightmares... if you don't really work them.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together.
name: Jack Kerouac

quote: If you're following your dreams, you're doing something you love and that you believe in yourself for.
name: McKayla Maroney

quote: Your targets can only be realized on the basis of dreams.
name: Recep Tayyip Erdogan

quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.
name: Eva Green

quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: I mean, every child at one stage dreams of being a prince or a princess.
name: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark

quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
name: Leonard Cohen

quote: I am accustomed to sleep and in my dreams to imagine the same things that lunatics imagine when awake.
name: Rene Descartes

quote: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable.
name: Christopher Reeve

quote: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.
name: LL Cool J

quote: I think dreams can come true, but not necessarily like fairy-tales. It's not always so perfect like that.
name: Patrick Dempsey

quote: My dreams were at once more fantastic and agreeable than my writings.
name: Mary Shelley

quote: It isn't a calamity to die with dreams unfulfilled, but it is a calamity not to dream.
name: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: The interpretation of dreams is a great art.
name: Paracelsus

quote: Genius is an African who dreams up snow.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: In my dreams, I have Keira Knightley's eyebrows.
name: Anna Kendrick

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
name: Suzy Kassem

quote: My first tattoo is a French proverb, and it says, 'Dream your life, live your dreams.'
name: Ravyn Lenae

quote: Dream the impossible because dreams do come true.
name: Elijah Wood

quote: Friends can have different dreams and do different things.
name: Sabrina Bryan

quote: I had to overcome challenge after challenge in order to take my life from nothing to living my dreams.
name: Curtis Jackson

quote: Education is at the heart of achieving your dreams.
name: Patrice Motsepe

quote: Singing for a documentary that benefits the underprivileged remains one of my biggest dreams.
name: Arijit Singh

quote: We must stop talking about the American dream and start listening to the dreams of Americans.
name: Max Beerbohm

quote: When your dreams are close to coming true, it does not feel real at first.
name: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You that you choose to be.
name: Joy Page

quote: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: To all the kids out there: Follow your dream. Believe in your dream. Because dreams do come true.
name: Rickey Henderson

quote: My greatest mistake is that my dreams were too small.
name: Shimon Peres

quote: I was always a dreamer, in childhood especially. People thought I was a little strange.
name: Charley Pride

quote: I'm just a normal girl who dreams, who fights for what I believe.
name: Leila Lopes

quote: You've got to have a dream... if you don't have any big dreams, nothing happens.
name: Ian Rush

quote: I was not looking for my dreams to interpret my life, but rather for my life to interpret my dreams.
name: Susan Sontag

quote: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true.
name: Paracelsus

quote: Night is the mother of counsels.
name: George Herbert

quote: It has been my observation that parents kill more dreams than anybody.
name: Spike Lee

quote: Ever since we were little, we were so on fire for our dreams. We never let anyone blow our flames out.
name: Kelly Rowland

quote: Never in my wildest dreams did I entertain the idea that I would become a fashion designer.
name: Giorgio Armani

quote: You can't give up on your dreams.
name: Anderson Silva

quote: Always wear cute pyjamas to bed, you'll never know who u will meet in your dreams.
name: Joel Madden

quote: Don't give up your dreams.
name: Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy

quote: When I came to America, I dreamed bigger dreams.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: I was a great dreamer of day dreams.
name: Abraham Cahan

quote: Take, if you must, this little bag of dreams, Unloose the cord, and they will wrap you round.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Judge of your natural character by what you do in your dreams.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: In my wildest dreams, I could not have imagined a sweeter life.
name: Hugh Hefner

quote: I have had dreams and I have had nightmares, but I have conquered my nightmares because of my dreams.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?
name: Jim Carrey

quote: You can go slow. Allow your dreams and goals to change, but live an intentional life.
name: Kumail Nanjiani

quote: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.
name: Les Brown

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I just kind of wake up with a new idea and new dreams every day, and I follow that dream, as they say.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: It is a lot easier to stay focused and keep your head above water when you are pursuing your ultimate dreams!
name: Maneet Chauhan

quote: It's important to believe in yourself and the beauty of your dreams and to not let anyone tell you different.
name: Victoria Arlen

quote: Dream in a pragmatic way.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: They thought I was a Surrealist, but I wasn't. I never painted dreams. I painted my own reality.
name: Frida Kahlo

quote: They were using the dolls to project their dreams of their own futures as adult women.
name: Ruth Handler

quote: Happiness is making your dreams come true.
name: Jourdan Dunn

quote: It is one of the blessings of this world that few people see visions and dream dreams.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: God's gifts put man's best dreams to shame.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Football is about dreams, about feeling a special sensation, giving a surprise, and inspiring joy.
name: Claudio Ranieri

quote: Seems like half my anxiety dreams are about airports.
name: Lois McMaster Bujold

quote: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just the determination to realize them.
name: Man Ray

quote: Big dreams create the magic that stir men's souls to greatness.
name: Bill McCartney

quote: You know, one of my biggest dreams in life is to play a Disney princess.
name: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: I was an electrician, and now I'm in 'Electric Dreams.' It's almost bizarre.
name: Liam Cunningham

quote: Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: I stayed true to my dreams and, eventually, they came true.
name: Kevin Hart

quote: For even in dreams a good deed is not lost.
name: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: Men are the dreams of a shadow.
name: Pindar

quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
name: Stefano Gabbana

quote: I'm not really that girl who dreams about her wedding day.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Believe in and follow your dreams.
name: Kristanna Loken

quote: Everyone dreams of living in Paris.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: The more you can dream, the more you can do.
name: Michael Korda

quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
name: Billy Wilder

quote: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand.
name: Kevin Kwan

quote: You're supposed to be using your gifts and fulfilling your dreams, at every age.
name: Victoria Moran

quote: A daydream is an evasion.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: There have been many dreams which have been personal guides for me.
name: Bernie Siegel

quote: But are not the dreams of poets and the tales of travellers notoriously false?
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: Listen to the sounds of nature. Wishing you the best on your trek towards your dreams.
name: Kalpana Chawla

quote: I am the underdog, and I want to prove that one can follow one's dreams despite all the flaws and setbacks.
name: Winnie Harlow

quote: You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions.
name: Jay Weatherill

quote: I had dreams of becoming an officer and a gentleman. But hey: One out of two ain't bad.
name: Rhys Darby

quote: If you dream the proper dreams, and share the myths with people, they will want to grow up to be like you.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: This may sound a bit naive, but I got here by believing in big dreams.
name: Howard Schultz

quote: You know, Willie Wonka said it best: we are the makers of dreams, the dreamers of dreams.
name: Herb Brooks

quote: Tell me about yourself - your struggles, your dreams, your telephone number.
name: Peter Arno

quote: When you stop having dreams and ideals - well, you might as well stop altogether.
name: Marian Anderson

quote: There are women succeeding beyond their wildest dreams because of their sobriety.
name: Mary Karr

quote: I'm not just a boy toy. I have feelings and dreams like anybody else.
name: Jon Stewart

quote: Women have to summon up courage to fulfill dormant dreams.
name: Alice Walker

quote: I only remember the end of my dreams, like waking up at a steering wheel, or falling.
name: Ben Barnes

quote: Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you.
name: Katori Hall

quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die.
name: Edward Kennedy

quote: You can plant a dream.
name: Anne Campbell

quote: The motivation is in my heart to work toward my goals and my dreams.
name: Nonito Donaire

quote: I still have dreams about CBGB's. I still miss the place.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: The world is seldom what it seems; to man, who dimly sees, realities appear as dreams, and dreams realities.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: I hope I can help inspire people to go for their dreams.
name: Laurie Hernandez

quote: The dreamer can know no truth, not even about his dream, except by awaking out of it.
name: George Santayana

quote: Dreams come true; without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
name: John Updike

quote: I'm fortunate enough to be living my dreams and a lot of other peoples' dreams.
name: Wale

quote: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities.
name: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: You gotta have a dream. If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?
name: Oscar Hammerstein II

quote: Dreaming men are haunted men.
name: Stephen Vincent Benet

quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: If you don't have dreams, you don't have a life.
name: Bryce Harper

quote: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Dreams are, by definition, cursed with short life spans.
name: Candice Bergen

quote: You have to keep pushing toward those dreams no matter what setbacks happen.
name: Anthony Hamilton

quote: When I was 16, I was like any other boy at that age who dreams of having a good physique.
name: Rohit Shetty

quote: Dreaming or awake, we perceive only events that have meaning to us.
name: Jane Roberts

quote: Whatever dreams I have wished have come true.
name: Annette Funicello

quote: Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: If you can't read, it's going to be hard to realize dreams.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: Death is the mother of Beauty; hence from her, alone, shall come fulfillment to our dreams and our desires.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: When we can't dream any longer we die.
name: Emma Goldman

quote: I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams.
name: Madonna Ciccone

quote: I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts, or my thoughts the result of my dreams.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: My office is at Yankee stadium. Yes, dreams do come true.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: Sometimes I wake at night in the White House and rub my eyes and wonder if it is not all a dream.
name: Grover Cleveland

quote: We must not let our passions destroy our dreams.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Much can be inferred about a man from his mistress: in her one beholds his weaknesses and his dreams.
name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: I always make my dreams into goals.
name: DJ Khaled

quote: My pictures are always part of my thinking, and my emotions, tensions, dreams, desires.
name: Ingmar Bergman

quote: I think that I could be an example to young people, and they know that dreams come true.
name: Maluma

quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.
name: Paul Gauguin

quote: We are near waking when we dream we are dreaming.
name: Novalis

quote: Our dreams are made of real things, like a shoebox full of photographs.
name: Jack Johnson

quote: It is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Dreams are illusions, and we can't let go of them because we would be dead.
name: David Copperfield

quote: I try to help people realize their dreams by using magic to tell stories that educate, move, and inspire.
name: David Copperfield

quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
name: John Barrymore

quote: I have a notebook that is filled to the brim with my dreams and ideas and goals and aspirations.
name: Karlie Kloss

quote: Do It Under the Influence Yourself! That's what we're shooting for! Get drunk and make your dreams come true.
name: Aziz Ansari

quote: Hopefully, young people will see that you can be young and make the sacrifices to follow your dreams.
name: Tinie Tempah

quote: We didn't know how to run a business, but we had dreams and talent.
name: Ruth Handler

quote: Dreams are illustrations from the book your soul is writing about you.
name: Marsha Norman

quote: Dreams get you into the future and add excitement to the present.
name: Robert Conklin

quote: All men of action are dreamers.
name: James Huneker

quote: The time I spent in New York when I was 17 gave me the confidence to pursue my dreams with my whole heart.
name: Leslie Odom, Jr.

quote: You've got to have dreams to keep you going.
name: Steve Waugh

quote: Never let your dreams go away.
name: Mike Piazza

quote: Learn from your dreams what you lack.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: Those who have compared our life to a dream were right... we were sleeping wake, and waking sleep.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: I think when you move past your fear and you go after your dreams wholeheartedly, you become free.
name: LL Cool J

quote: There's always going to be dreams and goals I have, but I never really tell people what they are.
name: Tyra Banks

quote: Was it only by dreaming or writing that I could find out what I thought?
name: Joan Didion

quote: My life turned out to be beyond my greatest dreams.
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: We cast away priceless time in dreams, born of imagination, fed upon illusion, and put to death by reality.
name: Judy Garland

quote: It's great to see our players get some of their dreams come true.
name: Nick Saban

quote: I have got the job of my dreams.
name: Cory Booker

quote: Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers.
name: Paul Wellstone

quote: Dreams are like paper, they tear so easily.
name: Gilda Radner

quote: In my wildest dreams I never thought - well, I never thought I'd work.
name: Steve Carell

quote: Dreams are the foundation of Hollywood. And dreams are the foundation of America.
name: Lupita Nyong'o

quote: When I was 20, the idea of having a play on anywhere was just beyond my dreams.
name: Tom Stoppard

quote: For all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.
name: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: Giving children a fair chance to achieve their dreams and reach their potential is everyone's responsibility.
name: Randi Weingarten

quote: My heroes, my dreams, and my future lay in Yankee Stadium. And they can't take that away from me.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: My dreams do not end with playing Major League Baseball.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: I've shown that if you dream and are willing to work hard, you can achieve your dreams.
name: Mo Farah

quote: Movies are dreams! And they work on you subliminally.
name: Carrie Fisher

quote: No wishes are silly, no dreams remain dreams, for those committed to clear and definitive goals.
name: Maximillian Degenerez

quote: I would like to instill in people just to work hard. As long as they keep at it, their dreams will happen.
name: Misty May-Treanor

quote: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: As far as my dreams go, all I want to do is be a working actor, and I happily achieved that.
name: Lucas Grabeel

quote: Dreams do come true. If anyone's proof of that, it's me.
name: Jennifer Hudson

quote: Dreams are the ones that really keep me moving all the time. That's what drives me.
name: J Balvin

quote: I can think of some things that would be fun, but I'm living my dreams.
name: Mike Farrell

quote: My mother was really my partner in every project that I had. She was just the great enabler of my dreams.
name: Diane Keaton

quote: You can't tell me that dreams don't come true. My life is proof that they do.
name: Fantasia Barrino

quote: All my dreams are coming true all across the board for some reason.
name: Jay Electronica

quote: You have a responsibility to move your dreams forward, no matter what.
name: Amanda Lindhout

quote: Everyone has their dreams. I don't write my dreams down; they just live inside of me.
name: Gracie Gold

quote: I don't like dreams or reality. I like when dreams become reality because that is my life.
name: Jean Paul Gaultier

quote: In bed my real love has always been the sleep that rescued me by allowing me to dream.
name: Luigi Pirandello

quote: One of the most adventurous things left us is to go to bed. For no one can lay a hand on our dreams.
name: E. V. Lucas

quote: Take everything easy and quit dreaming and brooding and you will be well guarded from a thousand evils.
name: Amy Lowell

quote: We all keep dreaming, and luckily, dreams come true.
name: Katie Holmes

quote: If you have a dream, just lie about it. Lie your way unto your dreams.
name: Joel McHale

quote: Hollywood has always been a cage... a cage to catch our dreams.
name: John Huston

quote: Everybody's a dreamer.
name: John Lithgow

quote: Sometimes, you follow your dreams. I say to the young people, 'If you have a dream, chase it.'
name: Karl Malone

quote: To see your friend's dreams come true, there's really nothing that can make you happier.
name: Josh Hopkins

quote: If you choose not to pursue your dreams, you'll still be a part of a dream - only it will be someone else's.
name: Mike Hawkins

quote: That's the thing about dreams - they're ineffable. If you can get to the bottom of it, it's not a dream.
name: James Lapine

quote: My family doesn't understand trying to chase your dreams because they were all about survival.
name: Cristela Alonzo

quote: I sometimes have dreams that my assistant director is waking me up and trying to get me to the set.
name: Lauren Cohan

quote: I just want that sensation you have in dreams when you fly to be real.
name: Janet Montgomery

quote: Everyone comes with dreams and illusions and promises. Everyone wants quick deals. They don't want to invest.
name: Dan Gertler

quote: We can bring to characters dark and bright sides that nobody even dreams about.
name: Sonia Braga

quote: But I am delighted to be a Dodger, I grew up a Dodger fan and now my dreams have really come true.
name: Milton Bradley

quote: To wear dreams on one's feet is to begin to give a reality to one's dreams.
name: Roger Vivier

quote: As I live and am a man, this is an unexaggerated tale - my dreams become the substances of my life.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I don't think the dreams die - I think that people give up. I think it gets too hard.
name: Tyler Perry

quote: I have come here only to share the voices and dreams of our children - because they are all our children.
name: Kailash Satyarthi

quote: I am a child of Hollywood and dreams. To me, to be on the red carpet is the best place in the world.
name: Steven Cojocaru

quote: One day, one of my dreams is to someday get to do Nemo in '20,000 Leagues Under the Sea.'
name: Nicolas Cage

quote: We do not really feel grateful toward those who make our dreams come true; they ruin our dreams.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: I love watching people's dreams come true.
name: Jessica Simpson

quote: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.
name: Queen Latifah

quote: I still have dreams in which someone is coming to the door.
name: Alek Wek

quote: I'm fulfilling my dreams that I had as a kid every single day. That's why I'm trying to enjoy it so much.
name: Aaron Rodgers

quote: I tell kids to pursue their basketball dreams, but I tell them to not let that be their only dream.
name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: One of my dreams is to walk down the runway during Fashion Week!
name: Zendaya

quote: I hope my children just grow up happy and pursue their dreams. I mean, that's all I can ask of them.
name: Ivanka Trump

quote: Fuel your kids' dreams. Sometimes, that means letting them stay up past their bedtimes.
name: Randy Pausch

quote: I like 'Donnie Darko;' it's a cool take on dreams and sleep.
name: Mike Birbiglia

quote: For anyone aspiring to be anything, I would like them to realise dreams require work. So work big time.
name: Lilly Singh

quote: We have lots of ideas, lots of dreams.
name: Masayoshi Son

quote: Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: I have big dreams. I want to keep songwriting. Direct films. Be a parent.
name: Sia

quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: I had nightmares as a kid. As an adult, I have very prosaic dreams.
name: Guillermo del Toro

quote: I don't want to sacrifice my life, as I feel that I'm still very selfish and still want to pursue my dreams.
name: Joanna Krupa

quote: The Columbia is lost, but the dreams that inspired its crew remain with us.
name: Dick Cheney

quote: My dreams have come true. I mean, everything I wanted to happen as a kid has already happened.
name: John Waters

quote: It feels good being a restaurant owner because it's part of my dreams of being the biggest mogul.
name: DJ Khaled

quote: When I was in high school, I don't know that I really had big dreams.
name: Alan Jackson

quote: Sometimes your dreams come true, and it's a real drag.
name: Kyle Kinane

quote: Our dreams drench us in sense, and sense steeps us again in dreams.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Don't let expertise fool you into seeing false boundaries or underestimating those with wild dreams.
name: Naveen Jain

quote: You white folks see UFOs in your dreams. You don't hear about Martians in Harlem.
name: Paul Mooney

quote: We use our parents like recurring dreams, to be entered into when needed.
name: Doris Lessing

quote: I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough.
name: M. C. Escher

quote: Go to school and get your education and follow your dreams.
name: Cam'ron

quote: A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: I've been blessed to live a lot of dreams.
name: Trisha Yearwood

quote: My dreams have become puny with the reality my life has become.
name: Imelda Marcos

quote: You have the dreams that you want, and then you have to do other jobs until you can get to that dream.
name: Channing Tatum

quote: I dream crazy vivid dreams. Like, entire movies. And sometimes I write songs about them.
name: Amy Lee

quote: All my childhood dreams have come true.
name: Lucas Till

quote: Whatever you do, life don't stop. It only sits a minute and dreams a dream.
name: Grace Paley

quote: I've been interested in dreams since I as a kid and I've wanted to do a film about them for a long time.
name: Christopher Nolan

quote: It's good to have plans and dreams, but don't be surprised if God brings you somewhere else.
name: Anne F. Beiler

quote: We don't have an eternity to realize our dreams, only the time we are here.
name: Susan L. Taylor

quote: Dreams can come true.
name: Romeo Miller

quote: All the things one has forgotten scream for help in dreams.
name: Elias Canetti

quote: The worst thing you can do to a kid is tell them that their dreams are invalid.
name: Juliette Lewis

quote: Though I know he loves me, tonight my heart is sad; his kiss was not so wonderful as all the dreams I had.
name: Sara Teasdale

quote: I've never dreamed of a story idea. I have such boring dreams.
name: R. L. Stine

quote: Hollywood is the dream factory, and no one dreams about older women.
name: Amy Heckerling

quote: Dreaming of a tomorrow, which tomorrow, will be as distant then as 'tis today.
name: Lope de Vega

quote: Only things the dreamers make live on. They are the eternal conquerors.
name: Herbert Kaufman

quote: I have dreams that I will reach balance in my life, and, at forty-one, I have none.
name: Andrew Breitbart

quote: I had dreams, but I didn't have the sense that they would necessarily work out. They seemed very far-fetched.
name: Greta Gerwig

quote: To provoke dreams of terror in the slumber of prosperity has become the moral duty of literature.
name: Ernst Fischer

quote: Man is a genius when he is dreaming.
name: Akira Kurosawa

quote: Dreams are a scientific fact.
name: Robyn Hitchcock

quote: In my dreams I am not crippled. In my dreams, I dance.
name: Louise Brooks

quote: You have to dream dreams to live dreams.
name: Eric Lindros

quote: Stories come to me in mysterious ways, more like dreams than reasoned creations.
name: Anthony Browne

quote: Writers write. Dreamers talk about it.
name: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: I'm just a regular Baltimore chick who believed in God enough to follow her dreams.
name: Bresha Webb

quote: I've succeeded beyond my wildest dreams - financially and the amount of fun I have in my life.
name: Phil Hartman

quote: Don't be afraid of your dreams.
name: Jacques Parizeau

quote: Wide awake I can make my most fantastic dreams come true.
name: Lorenz Hart

quote: People need dreams, there's as much nourishment in 'em as food.
name: Dorothy Gilman
